EPAM will not share any special categories of personal information to companies outside of the EPAM Group of companies without your express prior consent. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies: we will share your data with other companies within the EPAM group only for internal administrative purposes.  As EPAM is a global company with a presence in over 25 countries, we transfer the personal information we collect about you to our group companies in countries outside the European Economic Area, including in the United States and Belarus, in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems LLC\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"12.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Source Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#212121\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ordinarily, the most significant processing of your personal information is likely to occur in Hungary (for example, where our IT servers are primarily located), Belarus (for example, where Finance services, IT support are located) and USA (for example, where we are headquartered).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Other than Switzerland and Canada, the countries where we are located do not have an adequacy decision by the European Commission. This means that countries outside of the European Economic Area (except for Switzerland and Canada) to which we transfer your data are not deemed to provide an adequate level of protection for your personal information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"However, to ensure that your personal information does receive an adequate level of protection, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and intragroup data transfer agreements to ensure that your personal information is treated in a way that is consistent with and which respects the EU laws on data protection. If you require further information about these protective measures, you can request it from privacy@epam.com. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, customers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, and other third parties may also receive your personal information as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide payment for your services, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws, communicate with you and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWith certain acquiring or acquired entities:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the EPAM business for which you provide services is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM business for which you provide services (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal information may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWith personal information processors:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal information to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"Data Processors\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal information, and to process your personal information only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal information transfers.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
